oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Unaka Springs Hotel] postcard, 1912
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Real photograph post card (RPPC) of steer hauling a load of material. Caption says: Hotel Supply Co. Postmarked Unaka Springs, July 18, 1912. To Miss Mary Deaderick, Edgemoor, E. Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Cattle; Hotels; Humorous pictures;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Henry R. and Mary Deaderick Duncan Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
